title: Letter to Daiki
marks:
Inscriptions

URC, in pencil, Japanese inscripti
description: ten total lines; nine closely spaced lines; first line is broken into two parts and written in much larger characters; mounted to mat with mustard colored fabric border and inserted in mustard colored square fabric holder with ties and inscription on cover
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
